name: Rile the Restless
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You compel the restless dead to rise back to action. Target corpse within range is reanimated by you. It takes action after your turn, commanded by you. It is invulnerable, but its movement speed is halved, and it can't cast spells.

Each time you cast a spell, increase the radius of the area by 10 feet, then reanimate another corpse within range.

When the spell ends, all reanimated creatures collapse, once again dead.
empower: Immediately after being cast, the area expands once, possibly reanimating a second target.
